front.title: Mysterious Rumour

setup.p: Remove all Lead cards from the villain deck, shuffle them, and put them aside as the Lead deck.
Put the top H cards of the Lead deck into play.
Search the villain deck for "Other Plans for You" and put it into play.
Take Contessa out of the villain deck, shuffle the villain deck, and put Contessa on the bottom

front.gameplay: When all Lead cards have been flipped, flip this card
front.advanced: When Contessa would be placed on the bottom of the villain deck, shuffle Contessa in instead

back.title: Malevolent Conspiracy

gameplay.p: At the start of the villain turn, if there are H Knowledge tokens on this card, the heroes win the game
At the start of the villain turn, place a Knowledge token on this card.
At the end of the villain turn, put the top card of the villain deck into play

back.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, reveal the top H-2 cards of the villain deck. If Contessa is revealed, play her. Shuffle the other cards back into the villain deck

text.p: This card is indestructible
